definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: This event startled all the world.
This matter shocked both home and aboard.
This is the 918 incident that shocked the world.
sentences.chinese: 這就是震驚中外的九一八事變。

sentences.english: This event shocks home and abroad.
